title: Integrating Generative AI in Higher Education: Evidence-Based Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of higher education instructional design, digital literacy, and understanding of basic AI concepts
context.additional_context: Focus on establishing generative AI integration strategies tailored for personalized learning support and large-scale online education environments for professionals

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the educational applicability of generative AI and propose ethical usage guidelines
Learners can develop AI-integrated lesson modules by applying evidence-based instructional design principles
Learners can establish and implement strategies for utilizing bidirectional AI tools between students and instructors in online environments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
